532 Gallery Jaeckel
JOSE VINCENCH:
Pintura de Acción, 2023
22 kt gold leaf on canvas
200 × 261 cm
PURCHASE / INQUIRE
$20000
Shipping quote on request. Local pickup available.
About the artwork:

An action-driven composition incorporates Afro-Cuban elements, evolving political symbols into abstract gestures that demand new interpretations of power, faith, and cultural contrasts.

About the artist:

José Vincench’s conceptual art addresses Cuban social life, religious backgrounds, and political perspectives, incorporating Afro-Cuban ritual elements distilled into graphic simplicity. Evolving toward minimalism and abstraction in response to 1980s political shifts, his works demand new readings of gods, commoners, hope, despair, faith, and mistrust.

Vincench was born in 1973 in Holguín, Cuba, and lives and works in Havana. He completed his art studies at Havana’s Instituto Superior de Arte (ISA).
